data.title: LODESTAR - Ownership and Business Overview
data.meta_description: Who owns LODESTAR? LODESTAR is owned by Oracle. It was acquired on April 24, 2007. Was LODESTAR formerly PE-backed? Yes. LODESTAR was formerly owned by 2 private investors.

What's Mergr?

We built Mergr to save people the arduous and time-consuming process of tracking when companies are bought, sold, and who currently owns them.

Every day, new opportunities emerge around M&A and we help professionals of all types comb through transactions, investors, and corporate acquirers via an easy-to-use web database that is accessible to anyone.
